summary: The speaker expresses frustration and disappointment while searching for affordable family-friendly hotels on Mallorca. They spent the last one and a half hours browsing various options but found everything to be extremely expensive, with prices ranging from 4,000 to 6,000 Euros per week. The speaker feels defeated and has given up on finding a suitable option within their budget.
keywords: depressed, hotel search, Mallorca, expensive, family-friendly, budget, frustration, giving up
